document.full_text: wisconsin democrats have amassed enough support to force the first recall election of a republican state senator who voted for a law that reduces public sector union powers, an organizer said on friday.
document.title: wisconsin group gets enough support to force recall vote
lines_and_colors: wisconsin democrats have amassed enough support to force the first recall election of a republican state senator who voted for a law that reduces public sector union powers, an organizer said on friday.
